segments.text: The negotiation of the price has taken us a long time . I hope the following negotiation about quality will be quicker .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so , too . Our only request is that the quality is in conformity with the contract stipulations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . Our quality is based solely on our sales samples .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But what will you do if the goods we receive are not standard ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are sure to responsible to replace the defective ones .
segments.speaker: S1
